name: Junkan
tagline: A web app that cycles through a list of websites each one after another in an infinite loop
body: This github page is primarily used to host the most stable and current version of the app. This app runs completely within your browser and uses the local storage of your browser. Just click on the following and you ready to go - no setup or install is needed.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
